about_the_game:
In order to become a certified apprentice in this village, you must keep the magical shop running smoothly by yourself without any help from your mentor for 24 hours. It should be a simple enough test - EXCEPT you can't remember anything! Not to mention that the recipe book has been mysteriously destroyed and the storage room is a mess!

It'll be tricky, but not impossible, to make it through the day. Just don't let anyone see you sweat as you gather ingredients and figure out how to brew potions...BUT is the customer always right about what they want to order?

KEY FEATURES:


  • Explore the shop at your own pace—there’s no need to rush! Take a moment to pet the cats at the very least.

  • Gather ingredients and search for recipe pages scattered around. Solve the casual puzzle of potion crafting.

  • Chat with a fantasy cast of customers. Talk as little or as much as you'd like.

  • Sell potions and see where your choices lead you—experience multiple outcomes each playthrough.
  • A laid-back, magical time to be had with plenty of dumb jokes.

FOLLOW GAME DEVELOPMENT ON TIKTOK:

Tag along as I bring this indie game to life in an earthly realm near you!



Thanks for reading! See ya around, Apprentice!

short_description: It's morning time, there are customers waiting, and you can't afford to lose your job! Play as the forgetful apprentice and do your best to keep this magical potion shop afloat in this short, brew-your-own adventure.
